name: Refrigerator Detective
description:
Find the Sapient Food!

Known Defects

Main Menu

- Back Button on main menu does not function

Settings Menu

- No settings can be changed within this menu.

Gameplay

- Clicking on the same food item after a guess is used, does not subtract guesses

Soundtrack

- Volume needs to be adjusted by Windows either within Open Mixer or by lowering volume on speaker icon in notification area
